00020 
00021 #ifndef BOOLCONVERTIBLE_H_
00022 #define BOOLCONVERTIBLE_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Object.h"
00025 
00026 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00027 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00028 
00029 class BoolConvertible_base : public virtual Object {
00030 protected:
00031     typedef void (BoolConvertible_base::*bool_type)() const;
00032 
00033     void this_type_does_not_support_comparisons() const {
00034     }
00035 
00036     BoolConvertible_base() {
00037     }
00038 
00039     BoolConvertible_base(const BoolConvertible_base&) {
00040     }
00041 
00042     BoolConvertible_base & operator=(const BoolConvertible_base&) {
00043         return *this;
00044     }
00045 
00046     ~BoolConvertible_base() {
00047     }
00048 };
00049 
00050 template <typename T = void>
00051 class BoolConvertible : public BoolConvertible_base {
00052 public:
00053 
00054     operator bool_type() const {
00055         return (static_cast<const T*> (this))->toBool()
00056                 ? &BoolConvertible::this_type_does_not_support_comparisons
00057                 : 0;
00058     }
00059 protected:
00060 
00061     ~BoolConvertible() {
00062     }
00063 };
00064 
00065 template<>
00066 class BoolConvertible<void> : public BoolConvertible_base {
00067 public:
00068 
00069     operator bool_type() const {
00070         return toBool() == true ?
00071                 &BoolConvertible::this_type_does_not_support_comparisons : 0;
00072     }
00073 protected:
00074     virtual bool toBool() const = 0;
00075 
00076     virtual ~BoolConvertible() {
00077     }
00078 };
00079 
00080 template <typename T, typename U>
00081 void operator==(const BoolConvertible<T>& lhs, const BoolConvertible<U>& rhs) {
00082     lhs.this_type_does_not_support_comparisons();
00083     return false;
00084 }
00085 
00086 template <typename T, typename U>
00087 void operator!=(const BoolConvertible<T>& lhs, const BoolConvertible<U>& rhs) {
00088     lhs.this_type_does_not_support_comparisons();
00089     return false;
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00095 
00096 #endif  /* BOOLCONVERTIBLE_H_ */
00097
